message:
1. UBER GREENS

挑战向饮品，同学说味道像女人用过的面膜味道，我没有选择一口闷，而是仔细品尝了5口，我觉得这是个错误的选择。 有兴趣可以看看配料自己想象一下。
INGREDIENTS: ORGANIC CUCUMBER JUICE, ORGANIC CELERY JUICE, ORGANIC GRAPEFRUIT JUICE, ORGANIC GREEN CHARD JUICE, ORGANIC GREEN LEAF LETTUCE JUICE, ORGANIC LEMON JUICE, ORGANIC KALE JUICE, ORGANIC SPINACH JUICE, ORGANIC PARSLEY JUICE, ORGANIC TEA (PURIFIED WATER, ORGANIC PEPPERMINT LEAF, ORGANIC SPEARMINT LEAF)
